title: Appeals
context: ยง356D-97 Appeals. An aggrieved party may secure a review of any final judgment of the circuit court under this part by appeal to the appellate courts, subject to chapter 602. The appeal shall be taken in the manner provided in the rules of court. [L 2006, c 180, pt of ยง2; am L 2007, c 193, ยง6]
